Preference.AIAgentDescription: Manage AI Agent conversation records database
Preference.AIAgentDescriptionDetail: Here you can view and delete the size and location information of the AI Agent conversation records database
Preference.AgentDatabaseDescription: All AI Agent conversation records are stored in this database, involving only conversations with AI, without affecting Wiki content, occupying {{size}}
Preference.ConfirmDeleteAgentDatabase: Are you sure you want to delete the database containing all AI conversation records? This action cannot be undone.
Preference.DefaultAIModelSelectionDescription: Choose the default AI provider and model to use when not specifically set
Preference.DefaultEmbeddingModelSelectionDescriptio: Choose the default embedding model to use for semantic search and vector operations
Preference.DefaultFreeModelSelectionDescription: Free small model for generating summary titles and backup titles
Preference.DefaultImageGenerationModelSelectionDesc: Choose the default image generation model to use for creating images from text
Preference.DefaultSpeechModelSelectionDescription: Choose the default speech generation model to use for text-to-speech operations
Preference.DefaultTranscriptionsModelSelectionDescr: Choose the default transcriptions model to use for speech-to-text operations
Preference.DisabledProviderInfo: This provider is disabled, and its models will not appear in the model selection list
Preference.ExternalAPIDebugDescription: When enabled, all API requests and responses will be logged to the database for debugging purposes
Preference.ExternalApiDatabaseDescription: Database containing external API debug information, occupying {{size}}
Preference.MaxTokensDescription: The maximum number of characters (measured in tokens) that the model can generate in a single request.
Preference.ModelCaptionHelp: A friendly name to display in the interface; if left blank, the model name will be used
Preference.ModelParametersDescription: Configure the behavior parameters of generative AI models, such as temperature and token limits.
Preference.ProviderConfigurationDescription: Configure the API key and other settings for AI providers
Preference.SearchEmbeddingNoEmbeddingModelError: Please configure the default embedding model settings in the external API section first.
Preference.SystemPromptDescription: Set the system instructions sent to the AI to define its behavior and capabilities
Preference.TemperatureDescription: Lower values produce more deterministic and focused responses, while higher values yield more diverse and creative responses.
Preference.TopPDescription: Control the randomness of responses. Lower values make responses more deterministic, while higher values allow for greater variability.
Preference.WorkflowFileHelp: Path to the ComfyUI workflow JSON file

Prompt.AutoRefresh: Preview auto-refreshes with input text changes
Prompt.SchemaNotProvidedDescription: No JSON schema was provided or could be fetched. Form cannot be rendered.

AIConfig.Free: Low-cost models used for cost-sensitive tasks

ToolListPosition.Description: Configuration for tool list insertion position in prompts

Git.Description: Search Git commit logs and read specific file contents
Git.Title: Git Tools

searchMode.Description: Search mode: message, file, dateRange, or none
searchMode.Title: Search Mode

searchQuery.Description: Search query string (for message search mode)
searchQuery.Title: Search Query

workspaceName.Description: Workspace name or ID to search
workspaceName.Title: Workspace Name

ModelSelection.Description: Select model provider and specific model name
ModelSelection.Provider: Model providers (such as OpenAI, SiliconFlow, Google, etc.)
ModelSelection.Title: model selection

Prompt.Caption: brief description
Prompt.Children: The sub-prompt list will be concatenated from top to bottom, and from outer to inner, to form the final prompt text.
Prompt.Description: Complete prompt configuration, including type and content
Prompt.Enabled: Whether to enable this prompt, only enabled ones will be incorporated into the final prompt.
Prompt.Id: The unique identifier for the prompt configuration, facilitating reference via targetId in PromptDynamicModification.

RoleType.System: System - Defines the behavioral rules and background settings for AI
RoleType.User: User - Simulate user input and requests

Prompt.Source: The source or citation of this prompt (e.g., file path, URL, etc.)
Prompt.Text: The prompt content can include syntax supported by wiki text, such as <<variable name>>.
Prompt.Title: prompt

Response.Caption: Response header, used to identify the response entry
Response.Description: The response from an external API, typically used as the target for dynamic modifications in responses, shares the same structure as the prompt. It can be filled with preset content or serve as a placeholder or container, where ResponseDynamicModification injects the specific content from the external API's response.
Response.Id: Unique identifier for response configuration, facilitating reference.
Response.Title: response

ActionsTag.Description: Tag marking Action Tiddlers, which AI can find to discover executable actions
ActionsTag.Title: Actions Tag

DataSourceTag.Description: Tag marking DataSource tiddlers, which AI can use to understand data fetching and filtering methods
DataSourceTag.Title: DataSource Tag

DescribeTag.Description: Tag marking brief descriptions, which auto-load into prompts to help AI understand available functionality
DescribeTag.Title: Describe Tag

TiddlyWikiPlugin.Description: Load DataSource and Actions details for specific plugins. Describe-tagged entries auto-load as background information

EnableCache.Description: Enable caching to avoid re-querying wiki each time prompts are generated. Disable cache to refresh and reload descriptions
EnableCache.Title: Enable Cache

TiddlyWikiPlugin.Title: TiddlyWiki Plugin

pluginTitle.Description: Plugin title to load details for. System searches for DataSource and Actions entries containing this title
pluginTitle.Title: Plugin Title

WorkspaceNameOrID.Description: Workspace name or ID to load plugin info from (default 'wiki')
WorkspaceNameOrID.Title: Workspace Name or ID

Tool.Caption: Brief description (for UI display.
Tool.ForbidOverrides: Is it prohibited to override the parameters of this plugin at runtime?
Tool.Id: Plugin instance ID (unique within the same handler)
Tool.ToolId: Select the type of tool to use

WikiOperation.Description: Execute Tiddler operations (add, delete, or set text) in wiki workspaces
WikiOperation.Title: Wiki Operation

extraMeta.Description: JSON string of extra metadata such as tags and fields, defaults to "{}"
extraMeta.Title: Extra Metadata

options.Description: JSON string of operation options, defaults to "{}"
options.Title: Operation Options

variables.Description: Variables passed to the action tiddler, in JSON format string, default is "{}"
variables.Title: variable

workspaceName.Description: Name or ID of the workspace to operate on
workspaceName.Title: Workspace Name

WikiOperation.ToolResultDuration: Number of rounds tool execution results remain visible in conversation, after which they become grayed out

WikiSearch.Description: Search for content in TiddlyWiki workspaces using filter expressions
WikiSearch.Title: Wiki Search

Tool.Description: Search Tiddler content in Wiki workspace (supports traditional filter search and vector semantic search)

limit.Description: Maximum number of results to return
limit.Title: limit

query.Description: Query text (natural language) used for vector search
query.Title: query

searchType.Description: Choose a search mode based on rules or similarity.
searchType.Title: search type

threshold.Description: Similarity threshold (0-1), vector results below this threshold will be filtered.
threshold.Title: threshold

workspaceName.Description: Workspace name or ID to search for
workspaceName.Title: Workspace Name

UpdateEmbeddings.Description: Generate or update vector embedding indexes for Wiki workspaces to enable semantic search.

forceUpdate.Description: Whether to forcibly regenerate the embedding index, overwriting existing embedded data (if set to true, incremental updates will be ignored).
forceUpdate.Title: Forced Update

workspaceName.Description: The name or ID of the workspace for which to generate or update vector embedding indexes.
workspaceName.Title: Workspace Name

WikiSearch.ToolResultDuration: The number of turns during which the tool execution result remains visible in the conversation; after exceeding this number, the result will be displayed grayed out.

WorkspacesList.Description: Inject the list of available Wiki workspaces into the prompt
WorkspacesList.Position: Insertion position: 'before' means prepend, 'after' means append.
WorkspacesList.TargetId: The ID of the target prompt word, the list will be inserted relative to this prompt word.
WorkspacesList.Title: Workspace List

Search.FailedToCreateChatWithAgent: Unable to create a conversation with the agent.
Search.FailedToFetchAgents: Failed to retrieve the agent list

Success.ActionInvoked: Action item "{{actionTitle}}" was successfully executed in the wiki workspace "{{workspaceName}}".
Success.Added: Successfully added tiddler "{{title}}" in wiki workspace "{{workspaceName}}"
Success.Deleted: Successfully deleted tiddler "{{title}}" from wiki workspace "{{workspaceName}}"
Success.Updated: Successfully set text for tiddler "{{title}}" in wiki workspace "{{workspaceName}}"

Error.FilterSearchRequiresFilter: Filter parameters (filter) must be provided for search filtering.
Error.VectorSearchRequiresConfig: Vector search requires AI configuration (please configure the provider and embedding model in settings).
Error.VectorSearchRequiresQuery: Vector search requires providing query parameters (query).
Error.WorkspaceNotFound: Workspace with name or ID "{{workspaceName}}" does not exist. Available workspaces: {{availableWorkspaces}}

Success.Completed: Wiki search completed successfully. Found {{totalResults}} total results, showing {{shownResults}}:
Success.NoResults: No results found for filter "{{filter}}" in wiki workspace "{{workspaceName}}"
Success.NoVectorResults: No eligible vector search results were found in the Wiki workspace "{{workspaceName}}" (similarity threshold: {{threshold}}).
Success.VectorCompleted: Based on vector search, the following related content was found in the workspace {{workspaceName}}:

Error.NoAIConfig: Please configure the AI provider and embedding model first (in Settings).
Error.WorkspaceNotFound: The workspace name or ID "{{workspaceName}}" does not exist. Available workspaces: {{availableWorkspaces}}

Success.Generated: The vector embedding index has been successfully generated for the workspace {{workspaceName}}. Total of {{totalNotes}} notes and {{totalEmbeddings}} embeddings.
